title: BLUE LIZARD Mineral Sunscreen Stick with Zinc Oxide SPF 50+ Water Resistant UVA/UVB Protection Easy to Apply Fragrance Free, Kids, Unscented, 0.5 oz
description: Blue Lizard Australian Sunscreen for Kids provides head-to-toe sun protection that won’t slow them down. The mineral-based SPF 30+ formula protects kids from 97% of the sun's burning rays, and it contains no parabens or fragrances, making it ideal for sensitive skin.
